flawed_nl_solution:
Tory sold 12 packs + 7 packs = <<12+7=19>>19 packs to his family members.
Tory sold 19 packs + 5 packs = <<19+5=42>>42 packs in total
He has to sell 50 packs - 42 packs = <<50-42=8>>8 more packs of cookies to reach his target
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
